goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (pdf 468kB)
indicator_definition: This indicator provides information on the macroeconomic situation. It includes measures of the annual growth rate of real GDP per capita; the unemployment rate; and the Consumer Price Index (CPI), annual at February.
target_name: Enhance global macroeconomic stability, including through policy coordination and policy coherence
title: Macroeconomic Dashboard
computation_definitions: This indicator includes multiple measures. Information on computation is available at the data source.
national_indicator_description: This indicator includes multiple measures. Further information is available at the data source.
computation_calculations: This indicator includes multiple measures. Information on computation is available at the data source.
